function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased influence of distracting factors in online research due to pandemic-related restrictions, potentially impacting data validity.","Impact":"Decreased accuracy of research findings, leading to potentially flawed conclusions and recommendations.","Mitigation":"Use multiple research methods to investigate the same question and record limitations specific to each method to account for their influence on the validity of the findings.","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, participants in online research","Owner":"Research teams, collaborators, and stakeholders"},{"Description":"Shift towards more online research due to persisting restrictions of in-person contact, potentially affecting the representativeness of the sample.","Impact":"Reduced generalizability of research findings, limiting the applicability of the results to broader populations.","Mitigation":"Collaboration between research groups with complementary interests to test research questions through different approaches and settings. Consider the use of mixed-methods research.","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, participants in online research","Owner":"Research teams, collaborators, and stakeholders"}]}
